thread.title: BRIEF-Destination Maternity - Board Urges Shareholders Vote For Co's Director Candidates

title: BRIEF-Destination Maternity - Board Urges Shareholders Vote For Co's Director Candidates

organizations.name: brief-destination maternity - board urges shareholders vote for co
vote for co's director candidates reuters staff

text:
May 1, 2018 / 4:42 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Destination Maternity - Board Urges Shareholders Vote For Co's Director Candidates Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 1 (Reuters) - Destination Maternity Corp:
* DESTINATION MATERNITY - BOARD URGES SHAREHOLDERS VOTE FOR DIRECTOR CANDIDATES BARRY ERDOS, MELISSA PAYNER-GREGOR, PETER LONGO AND PIERRE-ANDRÉ MESTRE
* DESTINATION MATERNITY-BOARD ALSO URGES SHAREHOLDERS TO IGNORE ANY GOLD PROXY CARD SENT BY GROUP OF SHAREHOLDERS LED BY NATHAN MILLER AND PETER O’MALLEY Source text : ( bit.ly/2Kr4I6k ) Further company coverage:
